description: This header file declares functions and types for registering, updating, and unregistering cron events, including callback type definitions, in the Zilker SDK project. It defines an interface for managing scheduled cron events with support for custom schedules and event handling.

methods.name: registerForCronEvent
methods.description: Registers a callback for a specified cron event with a given schedule, creating the schedule if it doesn't exist.

methods.name: updateCronEventSchedule
methods.description: Updates the schedule for an existing cron event identified by name.

methods.name: unregisterForCronEvent
methods.description: Unregisters from a cron event, optionally removing the cron entry from the system.
